event.title: was allegedly caught at Bali airport importing marijuana from Australia in October

data.event: She was allegedly caught at Bali airport importing marijuana from Australia in October.
"Don't be stressed," Judge Sirait added as he adjourned the trial until April 14.
Her father, suffering with prostate cancer, said it was difficult to watch his daughter struggling so hard when things were nearing the "nitty-gritty now."
